manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: large Creative Building Block Toys for Preschool.Soft Building Blocks Set for 18 months to 6 years old boys and girls. Large Building Block Toys for Early Childhood Education Children are our future and hope. "Education is growth" succinctly expresses the original meaning of education, which is to make each person's nature and innate ability grow healthily, to develop curiosity and rational thinking ability, to cultivate a rich soul, and to appreciate aesthetic taste,sublimation and experience. Fun, simplicity and ease of use are our basic principles for developing toddler toys. We develop our products from the aspects of color recognition, hands-on ability, safety, creativity, etc., focusing on liberating children's nature, so that growth education can be achieved in a harmonious and natural atmosphere, and children can develop themselves in happiness intelligence, hands-on ability, and collaboration skills. This product is work for early parent-child interaction.This product is work for early childhood education. We can use this building block product in the living room at home or in kindergarten.

Creative Building, Stimulate Imagination, Build One after Another Interesting Shapes, Let Children Grow Up Happily. Creative builds. happy childhood. Let's develop children's creative ability, hands-on ability and teamwork ability together.Children can build simple numbers: 1 2 3 4... , they can also build more complex animals, such as rabbits, deer, etc., children can also build vehicles, such as trucks, cars, helicopters, etc. Etc.; this product can freely build a lot of shapes, the purpose is to let children use their brains, develop their creativity and imagination. At the same time, the construction is also very simple, it does not require a lot of effort, and a 3-year-old child can be promoted completely.

Soft Building Blocks Soft material, will not hurt the child's skin. Safe and reliable. Fun and creative. High Temperature Cleaning, Safe, No Peculiar Smell, Unchanged. You can wash this product with warm water no higher than 60 degrees. The product will not deform under high temperature and will not have any odor. As a toy for children aged 3-6, we have reached CPSIA, ASTM, CPC and other certification standards in terms of material safety and reliability. Creative Building Blocks Best Gifts for Kids Ages 18 months to 6 years old Block toys are one of the most creative and popular toys. However, there are still relatively few building block toys for children aged 18 months to 6 years old. At present, most of the well-known building block toys on the market require the age of 6 years and above, and the material is also very hard, which is not suitable for children under 6 years old. But the age of 18 months to 6 years old is a stage of rapid intellectual development, so our creative building block toy set must be the best growth gift for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are advertise as soft blocks. Theyre softer than legos, but they're still just large plastic blocks. I was hoping they were going to be more foam-like for a baby. Anyway, still a nice product. They come with a storage bag. Customer service is surprisingly good as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my grandson. He plays with these more than any of his toys so I purchased him another set. This are great for toddlers. Easy to handle, put together & take apart. Plus they are intentionally softer than other blocks. Great buy, comes in a great plastic storage container.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves these blocks. As a mom of a toddler I was worried about her chewing on them and breaking a tooth, but the soft material takes away some of the worry. They also came with a cute storage bag that helps to keep the stored away nicely. Highly recommend this for your kids or a gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not soft but still great
reviews.reviewText: These are not at all soft. They are light unlike legos and would have more give if you stepped on them. However they are not even remotely similar to silicone or other soft materials. Basically it is a thinner plastic.My 1 year old loves taking them apart. They will be fun when she is older too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Play Toy for 2 year old grandkids
reviews.reviewText: The grandsons had a wonderful time playing with this. They were implementing teamwork, sharing and imagination skills. It is a favorite toy when either or both are here visiting. I love the fact the blocks are sturdy but yet slightly soft. The blocks hold up well for building but flexible enough not to cause severe pain if you step on one 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seems a little cheap.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a Christmas present for my 18 month old son. I am back and forth about returning them. They are as described, however the plastic they are made out of is incredibly thin, assuming so they can twist and bend. I was expecting them to have more of a squish to them since they are described as “soft blocks”. There is literally nothing soft about them, they just feel like cheap plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loves them
reviews.reviewText: Christmas present for 23 month old, she plays with them alot when shes at grandmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Misleading, cheap legos
reviews.reviewText: These are not soft. They are hard, yet flimsy. If you stepped on one in bare feet, you would yell an expletive. In the picture, they look huge, but they are not huge. In the picture, they look soft like silicone, but they are not soft. The picture of the blocks is superimposed over the picture of the kids. You're actually ordering a bunch of choking hazards, but not enough to do much with. The wheels that pop on one block do not pop back off and do not turn. So if you think you're going to build a car or vehicle that rolls, you're mistaken. I wold return them if I could fit them back in the box. They even included a plastic bag for you to store them in. I personally like to keep my kid's toys where he can get into them, but I also don't let my kid play with plastic bags. It would be one thing if this toy had been described accurately, but it was not. I'm glad I at least got them on sale. I didn't even bother showing them to my kid. They're in the garage where they will stay.
